meanings.sent1: The hungry child was pigging out on candy.
meanings.sent2: She always ends up pigging on junk food when she's stressed.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon was pigging on the leftovers from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel was pigging on the nuts, storing them for winter.
meanings.sent5: The dog was pigging on the treats, wagging its tail happily.

meanings.sent1: The farmer's pigging was squealing in the pen.
meanings.sent2: The pigging was rolling around in the mud happily.
meanings.sent3: The pigging was chasing after its siblings in the field.
meanings.sent4: The pigging was napping under the shade of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The pigging was oinking loudly, looking for food.

meanings.definition: A device inserted into a pipeline for cleaning purposes.
meanings.sent1: The workers used pigging to clean the pipeline efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in pigging equipment for maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The pigging got stuck in the pipeline, causing a delay.
meanings.sent4: The pigging smoothly moved through the pipes, clearing debris.
meanings.sent5: The pigging effectively removed the buildup, improving flow.
